name: Shopping Cart Diagnostics
short_description:
Shopping Cart Diagnostics was developed to provide effective troubleshooting of your store for errors to increase business functionality. It comes in handy if you want to know whether: 
- your store user experience is poor 
- your website performance is slow 
- website security is violated. 
The service offers opportunities of monitoring the activity of users, testing store configurations, eliminating errors in server environment and security settings. It provides recommendations concerning website content and SEO friendliness. 
The integrated approach helps you check every aspect of store functionality at once and using only one service. For instant error check no registration is required. You are to provide the store website address and start the diagnostics at any convenient time.
